lead_paragraph: Nine governors visiting Capitol Hill criticized the Obama administration as too rigid, but many also urged lawmakers not to repeal the health law without a replacement.
snippet: Nine governors visiting Capitol Hill criticized the Obama administration as too rigid, but many also urged lawmakers not to repeal the health law without a replacement....

headline.main: G.O.P. Governors Seek Flexibility on Medicaid and Health Markets
headline.print_headline: Republican Governors Seek Flexibility on Medicaid and Health Markets
